title: Component Support for MLT Handler
description:
Would like component support for MLT Handler

Highlighting, Clustering, etc...

I currently have a workaround for highlighting (using interesting terms from MLT), but clustering is an issue.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content: Why not use the MLTQueryParser instead, then you can combine with components, filters, boosts, etc. That is a much more modern way to use MLT.

comments.author: Steve Molloy
comments.content: And with patch for SOLR-7913, you can pass in text to your request if that is your use case for handler.

comments.author: Dave Murray
comments.content: Need stream.body & stream.url from Handler, I guess theoretically if SOLR-7913 was resolved I could.
